text: the half-hoop of diamonds on her left hand third finger and held it out to him, still playfully. Without a glimmer of amusement in his own eyes, however, he took it looking moodily beyond her. 'Perhaps it's as well if you don't wear it for a bit, Di,' he told her. 'It is,' she laughed uncertainly, 'you can have it back.' She loosened the half-hoop of diamonds with a smile playfully. Without a glimmer of amusement in his own eyes, however, he looked beyond her. 'Perhaps it's as well if you don't wear it for a bit, Di,' he told her.
